title: Indonesia Modern City Break in the Centre of Surabaya
description: In the centre of East Java’s capital, layered with rooftop bars and bargain shopping strips, Holiday Inn Express Surabaya CenterPoint, an IHG Hotel offers guests a base to peruse the city’s endless entertainment. Endeavour to Tunjungan Plaza - East Java’s biggest shopping mall - wander through Chinatown for lunch or treat yourself to afternoon tea at Hotel Majapahit Surabaya - MGallery. If fresh air is on the itinerary, take a day to visit Mount Bromo, East Java’s smouldering volcano.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Surabaya CenterPoint, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 54-58 Jalan Kedungdoro, Surabaya, Jawa Timur, 60251 Indonesia

title: Modern Central Surabaya Hotel with Onsite Restaurant
description:
Experience the vibrant energy of Indonesia's second-largest city at this sleek hotel. Ideally located in the heart of Surabaya, this contemporary urban escape offers easy access to the city's rich cultural heritage and bustling shopping districts.

Dine on traditional Indonesian cuisine at the onsite Paparisa Restaurant or maintain your fitness routine at the well-equipped gym. When it's time to explore, you're just a short drive from the historic House of Sampoerna museum and the colourful flower market at Keputran.
offer_address: Jl. Manyar Kertoarjo No.44, Mulyorejo, Jawa Timur, Surabaya 60116, Indonesia

title: Contemporary Surabaya City Escape with Outdoor Tropical Pool, Three Restaurants & Onsite Spa
description:
Discover the charm of East Java while staying at this glamorous hotel in the heart of Surabaya. Start your day right with a hot drink and slice of cake at the Coffee Cafe, savour authentic Indonesian cuisine at Trimurti Resto or indulge in decadent spa treatments. At the end of a long day of exploring, enjoy a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool and a cocktail from the poolside bar. 

This elegant retreat offers a tranquil base to explore the city's rich history, bustling markets and local eateries. For culture enthusiasts, the vibrant Tunjungan Plaza is just a short drive away. Take a drive to the Suramadu View Point to marvel at the Suramadu Bridge.
offer_address: 68 78 Jalan Raya Darmo, Surabaya, East Java 60264, Indonesia

title: Contemporary East Surabaya Hotel with Onsite Restaurant, Two Bars & Wellness Spa
description:
Dive into the rich culture of East Surabaya with a stay at a contemporary urban retreat, ideally positioned within the thriving business district. This hotel offers an array of amenities, including the tranquil InBalance Wellness & Spa, and outdoor pool and children's pool and a games room - this is the perfect base for unwinding after a day of exploration.

Indulge in a variety of local and international cuisine at the Food Exchange, or sip refreshing drinks across two onsite bars. For a taste of local culture, Bungkul Park, the historic Al-Akbar Mosque and the grand Surabaya Submarine Monument are a short drive away.
offer_address: Jl. Raya Kedung Baruk No. 26-28, Surabaya, East Java 60298, Indonesia

title: Colonial-Inspired East Java Heritage Escape with Onsite Dining, Pool & Wellness Spa
description:
Step into the storied embrace of Hotel Majapahit Surabaya, a colonial-inspired architectural gem with tropical gardens and a sparkling outdoor pool. Built in 1910 by the famous Sarkies brothers, relax in rooms that whisper tales of a bygone era in a classic landmark institution where history and romance blend. 

A stone's throw from traditional night markets and cultural sites, you'll be sitting pretty in Indonesia's second-largest city. At your base, relish in dining at Indigo Restaurant which serves delicious East meets West fusion. Soothe your muscles at Majapahit Spa, whose therapies are rooted in tradition and sophistication.
offer_address: Jl. Tunjungan No.65, Genteng, Jawa Timur, Surabaya 60275, Indonesia

title: Contemporary Surabaya Escape near Maspion Square with Tranquil Pool & Onsite Restaurant
description:
Discover a fine blend of modern aesthetics and traditional Indonesian charms at this stylish Mövenpick sanctuary, perfectly situated in Surabaya's CBD. Unwind in the hotel's elegantly appointed rooms, work up a sweat at the fitness centre or take a refreshing dip in the sparkling outdoor pool. If you want some pampering, head to the onsite spa for rejuvenating treatments.

Take advantage of the prime location near business districts and shopping malls, try out the trendy eateries or venture a little further and visit Kenjeran Park and the beach. After a day of exploration, return to your hotel and indulge in an array of international and authentic Indonesian delicacies at Patita Restaurant and sip on well-crafted cocktails from the More Lobby Bar.
offer_address: Jl. Ahmad Yani No.71, Margorejo, Wonocolo, Surabaya, Jawa Barat 60238, Indonesia
